Opening Question

1. Go into "My Work" in the tabs above and pull up your stakeholder map.

2. Re-read your stakeholder map.

3. If we want to meet the need of these stakeholders, we will need more information. What information do we need to create an effective water conservation solution? Write your ideas in the box below.
What information do we need to create an effective water conservation solution?

To create an effective water conservation solution we need to focus on finding the information we need. We can't learn everything but if we design a solution without gathering information our solution might not work very well.

One way engineering design professionals determine the information they need is by scoping. Scoping is when we write down and organize our questions so we can identify important factors that affect stakeholder need and focus on what is important as we create a design solution.
